Title: Average-based fuzzy time series markov chain in JCI forecasting
Source title: Far East Journal of Mathematical Sciences
Affiliations: Mathematics and Statistics Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Computer Science Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Rachmawati, R.N., Mathematics and Statistics Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Johari, Computer Science Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Salim, A., Mathematics and Statistics Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: We employ average-based concept to calculate the value of an average interval of historical data, fuzziness to classify variables, time series to observe a certain period of data and Markov model in prediction process using transition probability. The analysis is applied to predict the currency exchange rates (USD-IDR). © 2016 Pushpa Publishing House, Allahabad, India.
Author Keywords: Fuzzy time series model; Markov chain
References: Arumugam, P., Anithakumari, V., Fuzzy time series method for forecasting Taiwan export data (2013) Inter. J. Engin. Trends Tech.
